knimeNode.name: Write Variables
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to write flow variables from the workflow to a *.variables file

intro.p: The Write Variables node writes flow variables to disc. They can be read back into a workflow in using a Read Variables node. 'Special' variables (i.e. those whose name starts 'knime.') are ignored, as these have special meanings in KNIME.

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: Select a *.variables filename to save the flow variables to. Other file extensions will fail.
An existing file will be overwritten following a warning if this is checked.

ports.inPort: An optional port for flow variables
